bestellung_pdf.label: Bestell-PDF
bestellung_pdf.description:
An uploaded file. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a URL to download the file in the form `https://<hostname>/files/<app-id>/data/<record-id>/<control-identifier>/<internal-id>` or `null`.

bestellung_nummer.label: Bestellnummer (automatisch erkannt)
bestellung_nummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

bestellung_lieferant.label: Lieferant (automatisch erkannt)
bestellung_lieferant.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

bestellung_datum.label: Bestelldatum (automatisch erkannt)
bestellung_datum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

bestellung_positionen.label: Bestellpositionen (automatisch erkannt)
bestellung_positionen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

ab_pdf.label: Auftragsbestätigung-PDF
ab_pdf.description:
An uploaded file. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a URL to download the file in the form `https://<hostname>/files/<app-id>/data/<record-id>/<control-identifier>/<internal-id>` or `null`.

ab_nummer.label: Bestätigungsnummer (automatisch erkannt)
ab_nummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

ab_lieferant.label: Lieferant (automatisch erkannt)
ab_lieferant.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

ab_datum.label: Bestätigungsdatum (automatisch erkannt)
ab_datum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

ab_positionen.label: Positionen (automatisch erkannt)
ab_positionen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

abgleich_bestellung.label: Bestellung auswählen
abgleich_bestellung.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

abgleich_ab.label: Auftragsbestätigung auswählen
abgleich_ab.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

abgleich_abweichungen.label: Abweichungen (tabellarisch angezeigt)
abgleich_abweichungen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).
